LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Military.label: obsidia military uniform
LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Military.description: Military uniform, perfectly protects and providing advanced skin sense feedback to the wearer. Designed for use by all Obsidia Empire militaries.
LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Worker.label: obsidia worker uniform
LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Worker.description: Worker uniform, good protects and providing performance improvement to the wearer. Designed for use by all Obsidia Empire workers.
LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Kid.label: obsidia kid uniform
LanguageData.OE_Uniform_Kid.description: Uniform sized for kids, well protects and providing advanced skin sense feedback to the wearer. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire kids.
